block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
MANHATTAN

CHELSEA 427 West 21st Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; eat-in kitchen, 13-ft. ceilings, 3 fireplaces with marble mantels, 100-sq.-ft. terrace, 2 exposures, washer/dryer in unit; maintenance $600, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $749,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
MANHATTAN

CHELSEA 427 West 21st Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; eat-in kitchen, 13-ft. ceilings, 3 fireplaces with marble mantels, 100-sq.-ft. terrace, 2 exposures, washer/dryer in unit; maintenance $600, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $749,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

GREENWICH VILLAGE 88 Bleecker Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 685-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; elevator, renovated kitchen and bath, live-in super; maintenance $583, 65% tax-deductible; listed at $335,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

UPPER EAST SIDE 203 East 72nd Street 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, attended elevator, dining area, renovated windowed kitchen, wet bar, 2 exposures; maintenance $2,233, 37% tax-deductible; listed at $1.3 million, 1 week on market (Brokers: Corcoran Group; Bette Bregman Real Estate)

UPPER EAST SIDE 360 East 80th Street (Leighton House) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,480-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, 2 exposures, health club in building; common charge $714; taxes $8,640; listed at $925,000, 19 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

UPPER WEST SIDE 11 Riverside Drive (74th Street) (Schwab House) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 980-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen, hardwood floors, roof deck and health club in building; maintenance $802, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $535,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)
BRONX

NORWOOD 3520 Tryon Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; elevator, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, hardwood floors, south exposure; maintenance $497, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $50,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Jeskill)

PELHAM PARKWAY AREA 2215 Cruger Avenue 2-family, 50-year-old semiattached brick house; 3 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, dining room, eat-in kitchen in primary duplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in simplex; front and back porch, 1-car garage, 22-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,658; listed at $230,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Sandra Silverman Real Estate)
BROOKLYN

BAY RIDGE 351 76th Street 5-bedroom, 4-bath, 70-year-old legal 2-family house used as a 1-family residence; dinette, renovated kitchen and baths, h/w floors, finished basement, 1-car garage, 35-by-107-ft. lot; taxes $2,645; listed at $499,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21/DeMasi)

PARK SLOPE 143 MacDonald Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. duplex condo in a recently constructed building; dining area, h/w floors, dishwasher and washer/dryer in unit; common charge $205, 100% tax abatement; listed at $332,000 (multiple bids), 10 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

WINDSOR TERRACE 207 Prospect Park Southwest 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,257-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; elevator, h/w floors, dishwasher, 2 parking spaces, Prospect Park view; common charge $241; 100% tax abatement; listed at $329,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)
QUEENS

FOREST HILLS 68-45 Groton Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 60-year-old attached brick house; front porch, dining room, finished basement, 1-car garage, 18-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,000; listed at $369,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Kingdom; Summit)

FRESH MEADOWS 75-49 190th Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 60-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, new windows, 1-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,243; listed at $359,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Goller & Costi)
STATEN ISLAND

ST. GEORGE 38 Bay Street Landing 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,518-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a 2-story prewar town house; dining room, 9- to 22-ft. ceilings, h/w floors, circular staircase, laundry room; maintenance $969, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $120,000, 19 weeks on market (Brokers: Kingsley; Gateway Arms)
NEW JERSEY

LIVINGSTON 72 Irving Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 12-year-old center hall colonial; fireplace, c/a, eat-in kitchen, 2-car garage, 75-by-119-ft. lot; taxes $9,811; listed at $429,900, 2 days on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

WARREN 14 Old Dutch Road 10-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 4-year-old center hall colonial; full basement, central vacuum, sprinkler system, 1.83-acre lot; taxes $11,323; listed at $799,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert)

WASHINGTON TOWNSHIP 259 Chestnut Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 35-year-old split level; eat-in kitchen, family room, patio, deck, 1-car garage, 140-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $5,500; listed at $339,000, 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens; Burgdorff)
CONNECTICUT

BETHANY 444 Bethmour Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 31-year-old colonial; center hall, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, 2-car garage, 1.51-acre lot; taxes $4,289; listed at $305,000, 24 weeks on market (Brokers: William Orange; William Raveis)

NEWTOWN 8 Sweetbriar Lane 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 6-year-old colonial; dining room, family room, rear deck, whirlpool off master bedroom suite, 2-car garage, 1.01-acre lot; taxes $5,053; listed at $382,000, 37 weeks on market (Broker: William Pitt/ Trumbull)

NEW CANAAN 161 Bowery Road 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 80-year-old colonial; dining room, fireplace, den, enclosed porch, in-ground pool, 2-car garage, 1.6-acre lot; taxes $7,547; listed at $789,900, 15 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

WILTON 249 New Canaan Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2-year-old colonial; 2-story entry foyer, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, 2 fireplaces, 1-acre lot with gardens and brook; listed at $715,000, 21 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker/Wilton)
LONG ISLAND

HEWLETT 130 Midgely Drive 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 60-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den with skylight, fireplace, finished basement, 100-by-50-ft. lot; taxes $9,517; listed at $499,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Jan Kalman)

HICKSVILLE 24 California Street 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 60-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, arched doorways, 1-car garage, 0.19-acre lot; taxes $3,100, listed at $220,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Long Island)

PLAINVIEW 15 Nixon Drive 5-bedroom, 2-bath, 46-year-old expanded ranch; eat-in kitchen, finished basement with workroom, patio, 1-car garage; taxes $4,672; listed at $259,000, 14 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Long Island)
WESTCHESTER

NEW ROCHELLE 80 Darling Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 46-year-old ranch; entry hall, dining room, skylight, hardwood floors, detached 1-car garage; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $8,055; listed at $335,000, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: Westchester Connecticut Realty; Merritt)

SCARSDALE 15 Franklin Road 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 69-year-old Tudor; foyer, fireplace, dining room, 11-ft. ceilings, 6 skylights, heated pool, 3-car garage; 1/2-acre lot; taxes $19,896; listed at $1,075,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Merritt)

WHITE PLAINS 20 Lark Avenue 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 31-year-old split-level; family room, fireplace, powder room, cathedral ceilings, modern eat-in kitchen, dining room, whirlpool, 2-car garage; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $9,082; listed at $389,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)
